Hero Strike.Name: Hero Strike
Hero Strike.Description: Your Strikes have a SPDx2% to trigger an additional time.

Waiting Block.Name: Waiting Block
Waiting Block.Description: When an enemy Engages with you, you have a WIS% chance to reduce the damage you actually receive by 1/2.

Moon Strike.Name: Moon Strike
Moon Strike.Description: Your Strikes have a DEX% to reduce enemy defence by 1/2.

Brave Strike.Name: Brave Strike
Brave Strike.Description: Your Strikes have a SPD% to trigger an additional time.

Lunar Strike.Name: Lunar Strike
Lunar Strike.Description: Your Strikes have a DEXx2% chance to reduce enemy Defense by 1/2.

Astral Strike.Name: Astral Strike
Astral Strike.Description: Your Strikes have a DEX% chance to reduce enemy defence by 1/2, and recover HP equal to 1/2 damage dealt.

Astral Impact.Name: Astral Impact
Astral Impact.Description: Your Strikes have a DEX/2% ignore enemy defense and recover HP equal to damage dealt.

Retributive Impact.Name: Retributive Impact
Retributive Impact.Description: Your Strikes have a CON% to deal your missing HP in undefensible damage.

Resistant Block.Name: Resistant Block
Resistant Block.Description: When an enemy Engages with you, you have a WISx2% chance to reduce the damage you actually receive by 1/2.

Empowered Magic.Name: Empowered Magic
Empowered Magic.Description: When you Engage with an opponent, you have an INTx2% chance to deal your Might - each enemy's Defence to all enemies adjacent to your target.

Pierce Strike.Name: Pierce Strike
Pierce Strike.Description: Your Strikes have a STR% to deal STR/2 additional damage

Sun Strike.Name: Sun Strike
Sun Strike.Description: Your Strikes have a DEX% to recover HP equal to 1/2 damage dealt.

Lunar Impact.Name: Lunar Impact
Lunar Impact.Description: Your Strikes have a DEX% chance to ignore enemy defence.

Solar Strike.Name: Solar Strike
Solar Strike.Description: Your Strikes have a DEXx2% chance to recover HP equal to 1/2 the damage you deal.

Colossal Impact.Name: Colossal Impact
Colossal Impact.Description: Your Strikes have a STR% to deal STR additional damage.

Hero Impact.Name: Hero Impact
Hero Impact.Description: Your Strikes have a SPD% to trigger 3 additional times.

Shielded Block.Name: Shielded Block
Shielded Block.Description: When an enemy Engages with you, you have a WIS% chance to reduce the damage you actually receive to 0.

Retributive Strike.Name: Retributive Strike
Retributive Strike.Description: Your Strikes have a CONx2% to deal your missing HP/2 in undefensible damage.

Solar Impact.Name: Solar Impact
Solar Impact.Description: Your Strikes have a DEX% chance to recover HP equal to the damage you deal.

Vengeful Strike.Name: Vengeful Strike
Vengeful Strike.Description: Your Strikes have a CON% to deal your missing HP/2 undefensible damage

Charged Magic.Name: Charged Magic
Charged Magic.Description: When you Engage with an opponent, you have an INT% chance to deal your Might - each enemy's Defence to all enemies adjacent to your target.

Colossal Strike.Name: Colossal Strike
Colossal Strike.Description: Your Strikes have a STRx2% to deal STR/2 additional damage.

Explosive Magic.Name: Explosive Magic
Explosive Magic.Description: When you Engage with an opponent, you have an INT% chance to deal your Might x 1.5 - each enemy's Defence to all enemies adjacent to your target.
